âœ¨ Key Features

âœ… Why Youâ€™ll Love It

âš ï¸ Things to Keep in Mind

  • Requires good lighting and a clear surface for AR scanning to work well.
  • Some features (animations, filters) may be locked behind subscription/purchases.
  • Though fun, the AR placement can be glitchy (elf may appear floating or mis-positioned).

ğŸš€ How to Use in Minutes

  1. Open the app and create your elf (choose outfit, look, style).
  2. Point your phone around the room (move slowly) so the app scans the floor/surface.
  3. Select an animation route for your elf (run, dance, jump).
  4. Apply a filter if you like (snow, night vision, etc).
  5. Hit record and let the magic happen!
